title: Report a Suspected Foodborne Illness
description: A citizen is calling the health department to report getting sick after eating at a local restaurant.

tasks.description: Gather details from the citizen: restaurant name, date they ate there, what they ate, and their symptoms.
tasks.expected_outcome: The public health nurse documents all the key information.

tasks.description: Log the report in the communicable disease tracking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The nurse creates a new case file for the potential foodborne illness.

tasks.description: Check the system for other similar reports linked to the same restaurant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The nurse checks for other cases to see if this is part of a larger outbreak.
